articles.title: Protection Against Omicron Reinfection May Be As Low As 19%, Says Study - NDTV
articles.description: The risk of reinfection with the Omicron coronavirus variant is more than five times higher and it has shown no sign of being milder than Delta, a study by Imperial College London showed, as cases soar across Europe and threaten year-end festivities.
articles.content:
The study also says Omicron shows no sign of being milder than Delta. (Representational)

articles.title: 'Significant amounts of water' found in Mars' massive version of the Grand Canyon - CTV News
articles.description: Mars has its own version of the Grand Canyon, and scientists have learned this dramatic feature is home to 'significant amounts of water' after a discovery made by an orbiter circling the red planet, according to the European Space Agency.

articles.title: Soaring COVID-19 infections rattle Europe, fuel dread about holidays - 9News
articles.description: Soaring infections have rattled Europe, prompting new restrictions and fuelling a familiar dread about entering a new phase of the pandemic just in time for the holidays.
